item.title: 由 Adnoc 投资的 VTTI 希望收购亚洲的液化天然气接收站
item.description: 由阿布扎比主要石油公司和维托尔集团（Vitol Group）支持的储能公司 VTTI BV 正寻求在亚洲投资液化天然气进口终端，因为该地区对这种燃料的需求正在增加。【原文：Energy storage company VTTI BV, backed by Abu Dhabi’s main oil company and Vitol Group, is looking to invest in LNG import terminals in Asia as demand for the fuel increases in the region.】

item.title: 莫比乌斯资本买入越南股票，看好越南经济升级和增长前景
item.description: Mobius Capital Partners LLP 已经增持了越南股票，因为预期越南市场将被升级为新兴市场。【原文：Mobius Capital Partners LLP has raised its holdings of Vietnamese stocks on expectations that the market will be upgraded to emerging-market status.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 正在考虑收购芯片齿轮制造商 ASMPT
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.公司正在考虑收购价值约 50 亿美元的半导体和电子设备制造商 ASMPT Ltd.，此举是继其他竞购者之前的收购尝试之后的又一举措。【原文：KKR & Co. is considering a takeover bid for the roughly $5 billion semiconductor and electronics equipment maker ASMPT Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, a move that would follow previous acquisition attempts from other bidders.】

item.title: 野村首席执行官在调查债券市场操纵行为后道歉
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.首席执行官奥田健太郎（Kentaro Okuda）在被指控一名员工操纵债券期货市场后首次公开露面道歉。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. Chief Executive Officer Kentaro Okuda apologized in his first public appearance following allegations that an employee manipulated the bond futures market.】

item.title: 西班牙成为投资者的最爱，银行和 Inditex 推动 Ibex 指数反弹
item.description: 西班牙资产已成为投资者的最爱，这无疑表明该国终于摆脱了十多年前主权债务危机的创伤。【原文：Spanish assets have become investor favorites, a sure sign that the country has finally moved on from the trauma of its sovereign debt crisis more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官埃利奥特称对中国的担忧 "被严重夸大了
item.description: 澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.澳新银行首席执行官谢恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliott）表示，对中国作为投资目的地 "消亡 "的担忧 "被严重夸大了"，该银行在中国的业务十分活跃。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Shayne Elliott said fears about the “demise of China” as an investment destination are “massively overblown,” with the bank seeing brisk business in the country.】

item.title: 肯尼亚 9 月食品价格上涨，通胀率降至 12 年低点
item.description: 在食品和能源价格增长放缓的帮助下，肯尼亚 9 月份的年度通胀率降至近 12 年来最慢。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation eased in September to the slowest pace in almost 12 years, helped by weaker growth in food and energy prices.】

item.title: 毛里求斯卢比创下 13 年来的最佳季度业绩，旅游业将为其提供动力
item.description: 据牛津经济非洲公司（Oxford Economics Africa）称，随着这个印度洋岛国夏季旅游收入的增长，毛里求斯卢比将在十多年来最强劲季度的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Mauritius’s rupee is set to build on its strongest quarter in more than a decade as tourism receipts in the Indian Ocean island nation’s summer months increase, according to Oxford Economics Africa.】

item.title: 安联首席执行官 Baete 称 Pimco 资金流入持续 "强劲 "增长
item.description: Allianz SE 的 Oliver Baete 表示，随着投资者对积极债券管理趋之若鹜，太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Allianz SE’s Oliver Baete said inflows at Pacific Investment Management Co. are continuing at a rapid pace as investors flock to active bond management.】

item.title: 阿达尼的达拉维项目获得国有土地批准
item.description: 印度马哈拉施特拉邦批准收购孟买东北部 256 英亩的盐田，这对阿达尼集团重建亚洲最大的贫民窟之一达拉维（Dharavi）的项目起到了推动作用。【原文：India’s Maharashtra state approved the acquisition of 256 acres of salt-pan land in the north-east of Mumbai in a boost to the Adani Group’s project to redevelop Dharavi, one of Asia’s largest slums.】

item.title: 中国违约开发商在投机狂潮中暴涨 200
item.description: 在北京与所谓的一线城市一起放宽对购房者的规定之后，中国房地产开发商的股价出现了前所未有的大涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese property developers rallied like never before after Beijing joined its so-called tier-one city peers to ease rules for homebuyers, following the Asian nation’s call to put a floor under the property market decline.】

item.title: 飓风 "海伦 "导致对芯片制造和太阳能至关重要的石英矿停产
item.description: 受飓风海伦影响，北卡罗来纳州的两家采矿企业已经停产近一周，这两家企业生产了全球四分之三以上的高纯度石英，这种材料对太阳能和半导体行业至关重要。【原文：Two North Carolina mining operations that produce more than three-quarters of the world’s high-purity quartz, a material critical to the solar and semiconductor industries, have now been halted for almost a week due to Hurricane Helene.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油巨头斥资 130 亿美元豪赌能源转型期
item.description: 阿布扎比国家能源公司正在进行其迄今为止最大的全球行动，收购欧洲中心地带的一家重要化学品制造商，并打赌这笔交易将帮助其渡过能源转型期。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s state energy company is making its biggest global move yet by acquiring a key chemical-maker in Europe’s heartland, and is wagering the deal will help it weather the energy transition.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚是欧洲的 "农民之国"，但其农作物正在枯萎
item.description:
罗马尼亚的农场约占欧盟农场总数的三分之一，日益枯竭的水供应正在危及该国在食品供应链中的作用。【原文：

Romania accounts for about a third of all farms in the EU and depleting water supplies are jeopardizing the country’s role in the food supply chain.

】

item.title: 通胀回升，波兰将再次维持利率不变
item.description: 在 9 月份通胀率攀升至 2024 年新高后，波兰将维持利率不变。【原文：Poland is set to keep interest rates unchanged after inflation climbed to a fresh 2024 high in September.】

item.title: 巴尼耶为法国制定紧急计划，令债券市场踌躇不前
item.description: 米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）总理周二的首次施政报告为他的新政府解决法国财政问题赢得了一些急需的时间，同时也避免了来自投资者的重大指责。【原文：Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s first policy address on Tuesday bought his new government some much-needed time to fix France’s finances, while avoiding a major rebuke from investors.】

item.title: 人民币期权押注显示对中国经济刺激影响的担忧
item.description: 如果人民币期权赌注能提供任何指引，那么市场对中国刺激政策的欣喜情绪有可能迟早熄灭。【原文：Market euphoria around China’s stimulus blitz is at risk of sputtering sooner rather than later, if yuan option wagers are any guide.】

item.title: 台风克拉森缓慢袭台，航班受阻
item.description: 台风克拉森带着强风和暴雨向台湾袭来，风暴将于周四早些时候登陆台湾，并可能导致台湾 2.5 万亿美元的股市连续第二天休市。【原文：Typhoon Krathon tracked toward Taiwan with strong winds and heavy rain, with the storm set to make landfall early Thursday and potentially keep the island’s $2.5 trillion stock market closed for a second day.】

item.title: 伊朗袭击令战争风险溢价回升，石油熊市面临考验
item.description: 伊朗对以色列的导弹袭击正在考验人们对油价普遍持有的看跌观点，这次袭击引发了人们对中东紧张局势进一步加剧可能导致供应中断的担忧。【原文：Iran’s missile attack on Israel is testing widely held bearish views on oil prices, with the strike raising concerns over potential supply disruptions from the Middle East should tensions increase further.】

item.title: 菲律宾对 Netflix 和 HBO 服务征收 12% 的增值税
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯周三签署了一项法律，对包括 Netflix、HBO 和迪斯尼在内的非居民数字服务提供商征收 12% 的增值税。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Wednesday signed a law imposing a 12% value-added tax on non-resident digital service providers including Netflix, HBO and Disney.】

item.title: 香港中资股大涨，开发商股领涨
item.description: 在香港上市的中国股票周三走高，延续了刺激政策引发的涨势，因为交易员们从公众假期中返回。【原文：Chinese shares listed in Hong Kong advanced Wednesday, extending a stimulus-induced rally as traders returned from a public holiday.】

item.title: 比特币在代币历史最佳月份的糟糕开局中下挫
item.description: 随着中东紧张局势的加剧，全球市场开始谨慎，寄希望于十月季节性熔断的比特币投机者面临着提前的现实检查。【原文：Bitcoin speculators banking on a seasonal October meltup face an early reality check as deepening tension in the Middle East drives a bout of caution across global markets.】

item.title: 甲骨文将向马来西亚人工智能和云服务枢纽投资65亿美元
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）计划斥资 65 亿美元在马来西亚建设云服务中心，成为最新一家投资东南亚人工智能基础设施的全球科技公司。【原文：Oracle Corp. plans to spend $6.5 billion building a cloud services center in Malaysia, becoming the latest global tech name to invest in Southeast Asian AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 日本公司抢滩美元基金，超越全球同行
item.description: 在投资者为货币政策分化做好准备之际，日本公司正急于出售美元债券，这是今年主要经济体中发行量增幅最大的国家之一。【原文：Companies in Japan are rushing to sell dollar bonds, marking one of the biggest increases in issuance this year among major economies as investors brace for diverging monetary policy.】

item.title: 中国重回新兴市场主导地位，MSCI 权重飙升
item.description: 在短短八天内，中国重新夺回了其在新兴市场失去的长达 10 个月的影响力。【原文：In just eight days, China regained the influence it lost over 10 months in emerging markets.】

item.title: 前红杉印度公司降低收费，缩减最新基金规模
item.description: 由于估值飙升使交易更难完成，尤其是在印度，Peak XV Partners（前红杉资本的一部分）正在将其最新的增长基金减少 4.65 亿美元，并削减其他基金的费用。【原文：Peak XV Partners, formerly part of Sequoia Capital, is reducing its latest growth fund by $465 million and cutting fees on other funds as soaring valuations make it harder to complete deals, especially in India.】

item.title: 港股随波幅波动，多头注意了
item.description: 连续六天，香港基准股票指数和跟踪期权成本的指标同向波动。上一次出现这种情况时，恒生指数在两个月左右的时间里飙升了 30%。【原文：For six straight days, Hong Kong’s benchmark stocks gauge and a measure tracking the cost of its options moved in the same direction. The last time that happened, the Hang Seng Index went on to surge 30% in about two months.】
